items.title: 'This is not a hoax': Epstein survivors speak out demanding files be released
items.description: Several Jeffrey Epstein survivors made a direct appeal to President Trump to take action as they demanded all the files be released.

items.title: WATCH:  Wedding crasher steals $60,000 in gifts to bride and groom
items.description: Police are searching for a wedding crasher who stole about $60,000 in cash and checks intended for a Southern California bride and groom.
